post:
This week we are bringing you one heck of deal. It's almost one of those "once in a lifetime opportunities" - that's how good this deal is. All that we ask in return is that you spread the word about **VPS Node Box** :)

I know that many of you have seen all kinds of crazy deals lately for OpenVZ or even KVM VPS packages that promise allot of resources for a very low price (especially RAM which can easily be oversold with OpenVZ or KVM virtualization platforms), but we don't offer anything like that. We use Xen PV as our virtualization platform and all resources are guaranteed. As you know Xen is pretty much impossible to oversell (the only way to do it would be to run the same kernel on the guest OS as on the host OS and use memory ballooning, but we allow our customers to run what ever kernel they want on their VPS, so if you are on one of our VPS servers you can roll your own kernel).

Our web site is: http://www.vpsnodebox.com
More information about us: http://www.vpsnodebox.com/about-us
Contact page: http://www.vpsnodebox.com/contact-us
Our blog: http://www.vpsnodebox.com/blog
Xen VPS servers: http://www.vpsnodebox.com/vps-servers
Hybrid Cloud Hosting: http://www.vpsnodebox.com/cloud-hosting

Here is the package that we are bringing you this week, with the following resources:

**VPS 768**
Virtualization Platform: Xen
CPU Cores: 4 (8 Threads)
Guaranteed RAM: 768MB
Swap Space: 512MB
RAID Disk Space: 36GB
Bandwidth: 300GB
Network Speed: 100 Mbit
Dedicated IPv4 Addresses: 1
Available IPv6 Addresses
Control Panel: SolusVM
Monthly Cost: $7 / month

All our Xen VPS Nodes are powered by Intel Xeon E3 CPUs with HyperThreading enabled running at 3.2GHz.

Direct order link: https://portal.vpsnodebox.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3

To take advantage of this offer use promo code: **VPSNODEBOX** - it's recurring for life!

**IMPORTANT** - We will be updating this thread later with ServerBear benchmark information. In the meantime we have here the benchmark from our previous offer (14 days ago) of 512MB VPS: http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2012/08/19/P2TnIhg3BdFkvNp4

**IMPORTANT** - For all those out there who are shamelessly practicing credit card fraud, we have implemented several layers of protection against you including CloudFlare (we are a certified partner by the way), MaxMind Fraud Detection, automatic activation is **disabled** and we also perform random verifications by phone. So if you placed your order don't panic if your VPS is not instantly provisioned, because as soon as order verification is complete we will provision it for you.
